meanings.definition: A hypothetical one-dimensional string-like object that is a fundamental building block of the universe in string theory.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study superstrings to understand the smallest parts of the universe.
meanings.sent2: String theory suggests that superstrings are the basic units of everything.
meanings.sent3: The superstrings in the theory are like tiny threads holding everything together.
meanings.sent4: In the world of string theory, superstrings dance and vibrate to create all matter.
meanings.sent5: Imagine the universe as a complex web woven by the delicate superstrings of existence.
